entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023
